question: The Aadhaar (Targeted Delivery of Financial and other Subsidies, benefits and services) Act, 2016 was passed as a?
explanation: The Aadhaar (Targeted Delivery of Financial and other Subsidies, benefits and services) Act, 2016 was passed as a Money Bill by the Parliament of India. The bill had borrowed some provisions from the previous National Identification Authority of India Bill, 2010.
